name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Claudify - The Ultimate Toolbox for Claude.ai

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your Claude.ai experience with Claudify! Download chats, search conversations, clean history, and delete chats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you use Claude.ai with Claudify, an all-in-one productivity toolbox designed to simplify your chat experience. Packed with essential features and easy-to-use shortcuts, Claudify lets you take control of your conversations like never before.

ðŸ”¹Chat Download:
Easily download your Claude.ai chats in PDF, Markdown, or Text formats. Copy entire conversations in text or Markdown with a single click. Perfect for saving important discussions or sharing notes.

ðŸ”¹Disable Enter Key Send:
Avoid sending incomplete messages by mistake! With this feature, pressing Enter adds a new line instead of sending the prompt. To submit your prompt, simply use Ctrl+Enter. Perfect for those who need more control while typing long prompts or code.

ðŸ”¹Chat Search:
Find any message quickly using the shortcut Alt+X. No more scrolling through endless conversations. Instant, precise search to boost your productivity.

ðŸ”¹Chat Clean:
Clear your chat history in seconds. Start fresh without saving unnecessary chats. Ideal for software engineers debugging issues or anyone who frequently changes topics.

ðŸ”¹Chat Delete:
Delete the current chat instantly using a shortcut. Keep your interface clutter-free with minimal effort.
